name: sltt-app
description: Installable SLTT app (Sign Language Translation Tool)
author: sltt-bible.net

scripts.typecheck: npm i && npm run typecheck:node && npm run typecheck:web
scripts.build: npm i && npm run typecheck && electron-vite build
scripts.copy:build:client: npm run find:version:source && npm run find:auth0_client_id:source && npm run rmdir:build:client && xcopy "%SLTT_CLIENT_DIR%\build" .\out\client\ /s /e /y
scripts.build:win:core: npm run find:version:target && npm run build:core
scripts.build:win:sign:norelease: cross-env SIGN=true npm run build:win:norelease && npm run build:win:update:metadata
scripts.build:win:release: npm run build:win:core && cross-env GH_TOKEN=%GH_TOKEN% electron-builder --win --config --publish always
scripts.build:win:sign:release: cross-env SIGN=true GH_TOKEN=%GH_TOKEN% npm run build:win:release && npm run build:win:update:metadata && npm run build:win:release:metadata
scripts.build:win:update:metadata: cross-env LATEST_YAML_PATH=./dist/latest.yml node build/recomputeHash.js && echo 'Do NOT forget to upload updated `dist/latest.yml` to release (e.g. npm run build:win:release:metadata)'
scripts.show:release: export versionTag=$(jq -r .version package.json); gh release view v${versionTag} --web -R ubsicap/sltt-app
scripts.copy:mac:client: rm -rf out/client; mkdir -p out/client; cp -R $SLTT_CLIENT_DIR/build/* out/client
scripts.build:mac:norelease: npm run copy:mac:client && npm run build:mac:norelease:core
scripts.build:mac:ifNoWinRelease: npm run copy:mac:client; electron-vite build && electron-builder --mac --config --publish always
scripts.delete:mac:release-assets: export versionTag=$(jq -r .version package.json); for asset in latest-mac.yml sltt-app-${versionTag}-mac.zip sltt-app-${versionTag}-mac.zip.blockmap sltt-app-${versionTag}.dmg sltt-app-${versionTag}.dmg.blockmap; do gh release delete-asset v${versionTag} "$asset" -R ubsicap/sltt-app || true; done
scripts.upload:mac:release: export versionTag=$(jq -r .version package.json); echo uploading to release ${versionTag}; npm run delete:mac:release-assets; gh release upload v${versionTag} dist/latest-mac.yml dist/sltt-app-${versionTag}-mac.zip dist/sltt-app-${versionTag}-mac.zip.blockmap dist/sltt-app-${versionTag}.dmg dist/sltt-app-${versionTag}.dmg.blockmap -R ubsicap/sltt-app --clobber
